title: AveragingInOutEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify the type of averaging used in an Asian option.

oneOf.title: Both
oneOf.description: The average price is used to derive both the strike and the expiration price.

oneOf.title: In
oneOf.description: The average price is used to derive the strike price. Also known as 'Asian strike' style option.

oneOf.title: Out
oneOf.description: The average price is used to derive the expiration price. Also known as 'Asian price' style option.
